name: PAT_IMMUNIZATIONS
description: This table stores a list of patients' immunizations that can be linked to the immunizations (LPL) table, IMMUNE.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique system identifier of the patient record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMMUNE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the immunization record.
